title: Histoire(s) du Cinéma 3b: A New Wave
original_title: Histoire(s) du cinéma 3b : une vague nouvelle
overview: Part  6 of Godard's 8 part examination of the history of the concept of cinema and how it relates to the 20th century
synopsis: Part  6 of Godard's 8 part examination of the history of the concept of cinema and how it relates to the 20th century
